```{r carga-paquetes, message=FALSE}

library(DT)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r lectura-datos, message=FALSE}
estadisticas_policiales <-
  readxl::read_excel("C:/Users/PC/estadisticaspoliciales2021.xls")
```

```{r tabla}
estadisticas_policiales %>%
  dplyr::select(Delito,
                Fecha,
                Victima,
                Edad,
                Genero,
                Provincia,
                Canton) %>%
  datatable(
    colnames = c(
      "Delito",
      "Fecha",
      "Victima",
      "Edad",
      "Género",
      "Provincia",
      "Cantón"
    ),
    options = list(
      pageLength = 10,
      language = list(url = '//cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/1.10.11/i18n/Spanish.json')
    ),
  )
```
